SEARCH
Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.maildir

Class MaildirMailboxFactory

java.lang.Object
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.maildir.MaildirMailboxFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
MailboxFactory
public class MaildirMailboxFactory extends Object implements MailboxFactory
Factory for creating Maildir-format mail store instances.

This factory creates mail stores that access Maildir-format mailbox directories. Both POP3 and IMAP use the store to access mailboxes.

Each user has a directory under the base directory. The user's INBOX is the root of their directory (containing cur/, new/, tmp/), while subfolders are directories starting with a dot (Maildir++ convention).

Author:
Chris Burdess

      public MailboxStore createStore()
      Description copied from interface: MailboxFactory
